node-sass 安装时版本的问题

April 12, 2020

node-sass 安装时版本的问题

项目中有依赖 node-sass 时，需要注意本意 Node.js 版本是否与项目所使用的 node-sass 版本匹配，因为 node-sass 对 Node.js 版本有严格要求：

NodeJS Minimum node-sass version Node Module
Node 13 4.13+ 79
Node 12 4.12+ 72
Node 11 4.10+ 67
Node 10 4.9+ 64
Node 8 4.5.3+  

否则在执行 npm install 时会看到如下常见的安装错误：

安装 node-sass 时的版本错误 ```sh warning Error running install script for optional dependency: "/Users/wayou/work/dev/github/angular-acbsws/node_modules/@angular-devkit/build-angular/node_modules/node-sass: Command failed. 通过查看本地的 lock 文件（yarn.lock 或者 package-lock.json）可以知道本地依赖的 node-sass 版本，再和本地的 Node.js 环境一对比可确定出问题，这里 Angular 项目中，通过 yarn.lock 发现使用的 node-sass 为 4.9.3，根据 node-sass 文档中的表格，可知我们需要使用 Node 10.

yarn.lock ``` "@angular-devkit/build-angular@~0.10.0": version "0.10.7" resolved "https://registry.npm.taobao.org/@angular-devkit/build-angular/download/@angular-devkit/build-angular-0.10.7.tgz#facfde114c25a4ca3cc5eb6178052a454e597c4c" integrity sha1-+s/eEUwlpMo8xetheAUqRU5ZfEw= dependencies: "@angular-devkit/architect" "0.10.7" "@angular-devkit/build-optimizer" "0.10.7" "@angular-devkit/build-webpack" "0.10.7" "@angular-devkit/core" "7.0.7" "@ngtools/webpack" "7.0.7" ajv "6.5.3" autoprefixer "9.1.5" circular-dependency-plugin "5.0.2" clean-css "4.2.1" copy-webpack-plugin "4.5.4" file-loader "2.0.0" glob "7.1.3" istanbul "0.4.5" istanbul-instrumenter-loader "3.0.1" karma-source-map-support "1.3.0" less "3.8.1" less-loader "4.1.0" license-webpack-plugin "2.0.2" loader-utils "1.1.0" mini-css-extract-plugin "0.4.3" minimatch "3.0.4" opn "5.3.0" parse5 "4.0.0" portfinder "1.0.17" postcss "7.0.5" postcss-import "12.0.0" postcss-loader "3.0.0" raw-loader "0.5.1" rxjs "6.3.3" sass-loader "7.1.0" semver "5.5.1" source-map-loader "0.2.4" source-map-support "0.5.9" speed-measure-webpack-plugin "^1.2.3" stats-webpack-plugin "0.7.0" style-loader "0.23.0" stylus "0.54.5" stylus-loader "3.0.2" terser-webpack-plugin "1.1.0" tree-kill "1.2.0" webpack "4.19.1" webpack-dev-middleware "3.3.0" webpack-dev-server "3.1.8" webpack-merge "4.1.4" webpack-sources "1.2.0" webpack-subresource-integrity "1.1.0-rc.6" optionalDependencies: node-sass "4.9.3" ```

如果不是老项目，没有历史包袱，建议直接使用最新的 Node.js 搭配最新的 node-sass 使用即可，

$ yarn add -D node-sass@latest
